osyfe.gui

Class GUIOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.gui.GUIOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Overlay

    public final class GUIOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements Overlay
    A customizable GUI overlay with all methods implemented. The GUI becomes deactivated when clicking somewhere outside. While deactivated, it passes all input events down.
    The GUI is organized in windows which contain rows, which in turn contain widgets. Once the GUIOverlay has been cleaned, it can not be used again.
    The style options are not working correctly at the moment.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUIOverlay(Font font, float font_height)
      Creates a new GUI overlay using the given GUI font.

      Is called once when the overlay is removed from the Screen.

      Is called for every input event that reaches this overlay.
      void logic(float dt)
      Is called every game loop iteration with the past time in seconds.

      Removes the given window from the GUI.
      void render()
      Is called every game loop iteration.

      Sets the color factor for the deactivated GUI.

      Sets the color factor for the deactivated GUI.

      Is called once when the overlay is added to the Screen.
